author: Special Correspondent
text:
A State-level science exhibition will be conducted by the Latha Mathavan group of educational institutions at Kidaripatti near here on January 29 and 30 to create awareness of national waterways among the public.

The expo, which will be organised in association with National Waterways Development Technology (Nawad Tech), will feature a working model of Ganga-Kumari waterway.

Students of schools, science, arts, engineering and polytechnic colleges can exhibit their science models at the exhibition.

Prizes and certificates will be presented to the best exhibits. For more details and registration mail toingenious 2k16@lathamathavan.edu.inor contact Senthamarai Kannan, coordinator, at 9942903930.
title: Creating awareness of waterways
